com.example.appointment - package com.example.appointment
This package implements the Model of the Model-View-Controller design pattern for the appointment scheduler.
com.example.appointment.controller - package com.example.appointment.controller
This package implements the Controller of the Model-View-Controller design pattern for the appointment scheduler.
com.example.appointment.exceptions - package com.example.appointment.exceptions
This package implements unique exceptions that are widely used throughout the appointment scheduler program.
